column4: hi, i screwed up my ubuntu 10.04 system so that whenever i install or uninstall pacakges i get a whole lot of dependency errors (https://gist.github.com/6845cdb6116391b180ff).  does anyone know how i can fix this?  is there a way to completely remove and reinstall sun-java6-bin and sun-java6-plugins?  When I try, I get the gist'd errors.
how the heck did you get sun-java6 on there anyway?
i think i just used apt-get install
